Blockchain and fintech will be at the forefront of innovation in a world grappling with social unrest, a widening wealth gap, & climate change.

As a venture capitalist, I'm passionate about empowering forward-thinking founders. If you're one of them, I'd love to hear from you.

At @mercuryfund I lead the Power theme. Power focuses on entrepreneurs building tech that rethinks and disrupts the way society organizes and accesses opportunities to build wealth and knowledge.
